name: cellulitis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a medical condition in which the tissue under the skin becomes inflamed (= red and painful or swollen because of an infection): That incident broke my skin and resulted in cellulitis, a long-lasting tissue infection. Following the injection the patient developed cellulitis in his arm.
More examplesFewer examplesCellulitis has a high rate of recurrence.The patient had had three episodes of cellulitis in the same leg.The same bacteria cause a tissue inflammation and infection called cellulitis. Cellulitis is characterized by the acute spread of infection below the skin surface.She was given intravenous antibiotics for cellulitis.
